verses.verse: Likewise this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the trespass offering: <WH817> it <WH1931> is most holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

In the place <WH4725> where <WH834> they kill <WH7819> <WH853> the burnt offering <WH5930> shall they kill <WH7819> <WH853> the trespass offering: <WH817> and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall he sprinkle <WH2236> round about <WH5439> upon <WH5921> the altar. <WH4196>
And he shall offer <WH7126> of <WH4480> it all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> thereof; <WH853> the rump, <WH451> and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130>

And the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is on <WH5921> them, which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the flanks, <WH3689> and the caul <WH3508> that is above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> with <WH5921> the kidneys, <WH3629> it shall he take away: <WH5493>
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> them upon the altar <WH4196> for an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD: <WH3068> it <WH1931> is a trespass offering. <WH817>
Every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> thereof: it shall be eaten <WH398> in the holy <WH6918> place: <WH4725> it <WH1931> is most holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

As the sin offering <WH2403> is, so is the trespass offering: <WH817> there is one <WH259> law <WH8451> for them: the priest <WH3548> that <WH834> maketh atonement <WH3722> therewith shall have <WH1961> it.

And the priest <WH3548> that offereth <WH7126> <WH853> any man's <WH376> burnt offering, <WH5930> even the priest <WH3548> shall have <WH1961> to himself the skin <WH5785> of the burnt offering <WH5930> which <WH834> he hath offered. <WH7126>

And all <WH3605> the meat offering <WH4503> that <WH834> is baked <WH644> in the oven, <WH8574> and all <WH3605> that is dressed <WH6213> in the frying pan, <WH4802> and in <WH5921> the pan, <WH4227> shall be <WH1961> the priest's <WH3548> that offereth <WH7126> it.

And every <WH3605> meat offering, <WH4503> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and dry, <WH2720> shall all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> have, <WH1961> one <WH376> as much as another. <WH251>
And this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> which <WH834> he shall offer <WH7126> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

If <WH518> he offer <WH7126> it for <WH5921> a thanksgiving, <WH8426> then he shall offer <WH7126> with <WH5921> the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil, <WH8081> and cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> of fine flour, <WH5560> fried. <WH7246>

Besides <WH5921> the cakes, <WH2471> he shall offer <WH7126> for his offering <WH7133> leavened <WH2557> bread <WH3899> with <WH5921> the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> of his peace offerings. <WH8002>

And of <WH4480> it he shall offer <WH7126> one <WH259> out of the whole <WH4480> <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> for a heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD, <WH3068> and it shall be <WH1961> the priest's <WH3548> that sprinkleth <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings. <WH8002>

And the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> for thanksgiving <WH8426> shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3117> that it is offered; <WH7133> he shall not <WH3808> leave <WH5117> any of <WH4480> it until <WH5704> the morning. <WH1242>

But if <WH518> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his offering <WH7133> be a vow, <WH5088> or <WH176> a voluntary offering, <WH5071> it shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3117> that he offereth <WH7126> <WH853> his sacrifice: <WH2077> and on the morrow <WH4480> <WH4283> also the remainder <WH3498> of <WH4480> it shall be eaten: <WH398>
But the remainder <WH3498> of the flesh <WH4480> <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>

And if <WH518> any of the flesh <WH4480> <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> be eaten at all <WH398> <WH398> on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> it shall not <WH3808> be accepted, <WH7521> neither <WH3808> shall it be imputed <WH2803> unto him that offereth <WH7126> it: it shall be <WH1961> an abomination, <WH6292> and the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> of <WH4480> it shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

And the flesh <WH1320> that <WH834> toucheth <WH5060> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2931> thing shall not <WH3808> be eaten; <WH398> it shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire: <WH784> and as for the flesh, <WH1320> all <WH3605> that be clean <WH2889> shall eat <WH398> thereof. <WH1320>

But the soul <WH5315> that <WH834> eateth <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH4480> <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> that <WH834> pertain unto the LORD, <WH3068> having his uncleanness <WH2932> upon <WH5921> him, even that <WH1931> soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>

Moreover the soul <WH5315> that <WH3588> shall touch <WH5060> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2931> thing, as the uncleanness <WH2932> of man, <WH120> or <WH176> any unclean <WH2931> beast, <WH929> or <WH176> any <WH3605> abominable <WH8263> unclean <WH2931> thing, and eat <WH398> of the flesh <WH4480> <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> which <WH834> pertain unto the LORD, <WH3068> even that <WH1931> soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> Ye shall eat <WH398> no manner <WH3808> <WH3605> of fat, <WH2459> of ox, <WH7794> or of sheep, <WH3775> or of goat. <WH5795>

And the fat <WH2459> of the beast that dieth of itself, <WH5038> and the fat <WH2459> of that which is torn with beasts, <WH2966> may be used <WH6213> in any <WH3605> other use: <WH4399> but ye shall in no wise eat <WH3808> <WH398> <WH398> of it.

For <WH3588> whosoever <WH3605> eateth <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of <WH4480> the beast, <WH929> of which <WH834> <WH4480> men offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD, <WH3068> even the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> it shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>
Moreover ye shall eat <WH398> no manner <WH3808> <WH3605> of blood, <WH1818> whether it be of fowl <WH5775> or of beast, <WH929> in any <WH3605> of your dwellings. <WH4186>

Whatsoever <WH3605> soul <WH5315> it be that <WH834> eateth <WH398> any manner <WH3605> of blood, <WH1818> even that <WH1931> soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> He that offereth <WH7126> <WH853> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> unto the LORD <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> <WH853> his oblation <WH7133> unto the LORD <WH3068> of the sacrifice <WH4480> <WH2077> of his peace offerings. <WH8002>

His own hands <WH3027> shall bring <WH935> <WH853> the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <WH801> <WH3068> <WH853> the fat <WH2459> with <WH5921> the breast, <WH2373> it shall he bring, <WH935> <WH853> that the breast <WH2373> may be waved <WH5130> <WH853> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH853> the fat <WH2459> upon the altar: <WH4196> but the breast <WH2373> shall be <WH1961> Aaron's <WH175> and his sons'. <WH1121>
And the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> shall ye give <WH5414> unto the priest <WH3548> for a heave offering <WH8641> of the sacrifices <WH4480> <WH2077> of your peace offerings. <WH8002>

He among the sons <WH4480> <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> that offereth <WH7126> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings, <WH8002> and the fat, <WH2459> shall have <WH1961> the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> for his part. <WH4440>

For <WH3588> <WH853> the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and the heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> have I taken <WH3947> of <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from off the sacrifices <WH4480> <WH2077> of their peace offerings, <WH8002> and have given <WH5414> them unto Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> and unto his sons <WH1121> by a statute <WH2706> forever <WH5769> from among <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

This <WH2063> is the portion of the anointing <WH4888> of Aaron, <WH175> and of the anointing <WH4888> of his sons, <WH1121> out of the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <WH4480> <WH801> <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when he presented <WH7126> them to minister unto the LORD in the priest's office; <WH3547> <WH3068>

Which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to be given <WH5414> them of <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> in the day <WH3117> that he anointed <WH4886> them, by a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout their generations. <WH1755>

This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the burnt offering, <WH5930> of the meat offering, <WH4503> and of the sin offering, <WH2403> and of the trespass offering, <WH817> and of the consecrations, <WH4394> and of the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace offerings; <WH8002>

Which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> in the day <WH3117> that he commanded <WH6680> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to offer <WH7126> <WH853> their oblations <WH7133> unto the LORD, <WH3068> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>
